headline: Nordson (NDSN) Balances Dividend Consistency with Disciplined Growth
summary: Nordson Corporation (NASDAQ:NDSN) is included among the Dividend Growth Stocks: 25 Aristocrats. Nordson Corporation (NASDAQ:NDSN) has built a loyal following among dividend investors, and it’s easy to see why. The company has raised its dividend for 62 straight years, placing it among the longest-running dividend growth stories in the market. As a high-quality industrial compounder, […]
